198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: group_decision_iteration_count
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: The number of iterations or rounds needed to reach a group decision on weekend activities.

tags.description: Identifier for the specific group of friends.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: individual_participation_rate
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Frequency of individual agents participating in discussions or proposing activities.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: preference_alignment_score
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Degree of alignment among agents' preferences, measured at the start and end of planning.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: average_response_time
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Average time taken by agents to respond to messages or proposals.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: conflict_occurrence_count
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Number of conflicts or disagreements that occur during decision-making.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: decision_satisfaction_score
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Agents' satisfaction level with the final decision, rated on a scale.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: participation_diversity_ratio
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Ratio of diverse participant involvement in activities or discussions.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: decision_time_duration
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Total time taken from start to final decision.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: resource_utilization_ratio
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Efficiency of resource usage within the decision-making process, like time or effort.

tags.description: Type of resource, e.g., time, energy.

198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.name: agent_influence_score
198ed2a7-63f2-44c6-8cda-6836a15991e7.description: Measure of each agent's influence over the final decision.
